mapper.select: select id, ele_server_id, create_uid, old_server_begin_time, old_server_end_time, new_server_begin_time, new_server_end_time, create_time from t_electricity_cabinet_server_oper_record where id = #{id}

select id, ele_server_id, create_uid, old_server_begin_time, old_server_end_time, new_server_begin_time, new_server_end_time, create_time from t_electricity_cabinet_server_oper_record limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into t_electricity_cabinet_server_oper_record(ele_server_id, create_uid, old_server_begin_time, old_server_end_time, new_server_begin_time, new_server_end_time, create_time) values (#{eleServerId}, #{createUid}, #{oldServerBeginTime}, #{oldServerEndTime}, #{newServerBeginTime}, #{newServerEndTime}, #{createTime})
mapper.update:
update t_electricity_cabinet_server_oper_record
ele_server_id = #{eleServerId},
create_uid = #{createUid},
old_server_begin_time = #{oldServerBeginTime},
old_server_end_time = #{oldServerEndTime},
new_server_begin_time = #{newServerBeginTime},
new_server_end_time = #{newServerEndTime},
create_time = #{createTime},
where id = #{id}
